definition: particle indicating that a previously asked question is to be applied to the preceding word ("What about ...?", "And ...?")/particle for inquiring about location ("Where is ...?")/particle signaling a pause, to emphasize the preceding words and allow the listener time to take them on board ("ok?", "are you with me?")/(at the end of a declarative sentence) particle indicating continuation of a state or action/particle indicating strong affirmation
whispering in a low voice (idiom); murmuring

sentences.english: The jasmine’s lisping of love to the sun is her flowers.
sentences.chinese: 茉莉呢喃着用花朵来表达对太阳的爱恋。

sentences.english: I want to sooth your upset soul with my soft and sweet whispers.
sentences.chinese: 想用我轻柔温情的呢喃，抚慰你驿动不安的心灵。

sentences.english: Thee swallow twittering from the straw-built shed.
sentences.chinese: 茅草棚上燕子的细语呢喃。

sentences.english: The waves will stand a-tiptoe to kiss your neck and whisper in your ears.
sentences.chinese: 波浪踮着脚尖亲吻你的颈脖，在你耳旁呢喃。

sentences.english: I missed my sister's sleepy mumbles.
sentences.chinese: 我想念妹妹睡梦中的呢喃。

sentences.english: Where once the very air vibrated with the twittering of thousands of kinds of birds is now only silence.
sentences.chinese: 成千上万的鸟儿那响彻四方的呢喃也归为寂静。

sentences.english: Enlight lips twitter whose memorable name in my heart.
sentences.chinese: 微启的双唇呢喃谁的姓名心头难忘。

sentences.english: The moan of doves in immemorial elms.
sentences.chinese: 古老的榆树林中鸽子的呢喃。

sentences.english: The legendary Urn of Whispering Warriors. Said to contain souls of the entire Tenshu army.
sentences.chinese: 呢喃武士们的灵坛，据说装着整个天蜀大军的亡灵。

sentences.english: Tom held Amy in his arms and whispered in her ear.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆把艾咪抱在怀里，并在她耳边软语呢喃。

sentences.english: The swallow twittering from the straw-built shed.
sentences.chinese: 茅草棚上燕子的细语呢喃。

sentences.english: Under the eaves, last stop twittering swallow, love words.
sentences.chinese: 屋檐下，去年停留的燕子，呢喃着恩恩爱爱的情话。

sentences.english: Such as you read in your books of the pleadings and wooings of lovers.
sentences.chinese: 就像你读的书里恋人们的求爱和呢喃。

definition: to talk in one's sleep/crazy talk
talking in one's sleep/delirious ravings/nonsense/sheer fantasy
whispering in a low voice (idiom); murmuring
to chant/to recite rhythmically/to polish verse
to talk to oneself/to think aloud/to soliloquize
